mapper.select: /* 0. 테이블 전체 조회 */ SELECT t.id, t.category_id, c.category_name, t.detail, t.lat, t.lng, t.place, t.region, t.address, t.cluster_id FROM tptp AS t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY t.id LIMIT 1000;

/* 2-1. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 자연경관 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = 'CT1' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 2-2. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 문화재 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = 'CT2' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 2-3. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 테마공원 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = 'CT3' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 2-4. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 관광지 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = 'CT4' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

SELECT t.id, t.category_id, c.category_name, t.detail, t.lat, t.lng, t.place, t.region, t.address, t.cluster_id FROM tptp AS t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE t.category_id = #{category.ct1} OR t.category_id = #{category.ct2} OR t.category_id = #{category.ct3} OR t.category_id = #{category.ct4} ORDER BY t.id LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{currentNumber.num};
